import React, { useState } from "react"; function Portfolio() { const [filter, setFilter] = useState("all"); const projects = [ { id: 1, title: "BookshelfApp", category: ["web", "frontend"], // Menggunakan array untuk multiple kategori image: "/projects/portfolio.jpg", description: "Website CRUD Sederhana", technologies: ["HTML", "CSS", "JavaScript"], link: "https://yosparpur.github.io/bookshelf-app-starter-project/", }, { id: 2, title: "Data Analyst Project", category: ["dataanalyst"], image: "/projects/dataanalyst.jpg", description: "Proyek Analisis Data", technologies: ["Python", "Pandas", "Matplotlib"], link: "#", }, { id: 3, title: "Portfolio Website", category: ["web", "frontend"], // Proyek ini masuk kategori web dan frontend image: "/projects/portfolio-react.jpg", description: "Website Portfolio menggunakan React.js", technologies: ["React", "CSS", "JavaScript"], link: "#", } ]; return (

Portfolio

{projects .filter((project) => filter === "all" || project.category.includes(filter)) // Menggunakan includes untuk cek kategori .map((project) => (

{project.title}

{project.technologies.map((tech) => ( {tech} ))}
View Project

{project.title}

{project.description}

))}
); } export default Portfolio;
